ch0251_00_onion/0101_0701_01_10:
H-hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Let’s do
our b-best today...
ch0251_00_onion/7101_0701_02_10:
In Galar, it makes certain Pokémon change their
appearance when they Dynamax.
ch0251_00_onion/7101_0701_03_10:
B-but I’ve heard that, for some reason, it happens
on Pasio, too... I was so shocked to learn that, my
mask nearly fell off...
ch0251_00_onion/7102_0701_02_10:
D-don’t look at me so intensely... I don’t like when
people st-stare at me...
ch0251_00_onion/7102_0701_03_10:
I always wear my mask, even at my Gym... There
are so many strangers here on Pasio, I don’t think
I’ll ever be able to take it off...
ch0251_00_onion/7103_0701_01_10:
People often ask me whether it’s scary to be
around ghost Pokémon all the time...
ch0251_00_onion/7103_0701_02_10: But to me, people are way scarier...
ch0251_00_onion/7103_0701_03_10:
You seem fine even when you’re surrounded by
lots of people... I don’t know how you do it.
ch0251_00_onion/7104_0701_01_10:
Did you know that while a Gengar is
Gigantamaxed, its mouth is a passage
to the afterlife?
ch0251_00_onion/7104_0701_02_10: I nearly died once when I was young...
ch0251_00_onion/7104_0701_03_10:
Sometimes I wonder if perhaps I came back
through a Gengar’s mouth.
ch0251_00_onion/7105_0701_01_10:
I-I’m scared of people looking at me, so I always
need to wear my mask...
ch0251_00_onion/7105_0701_02_10:
But I’m OK with you seeing my face,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0251_00_onion/1701_0701_01_10:
U-um... You can have this. G-Gengar found it in
the shadows...
ch0251_00_onion/1701_0702_01_10: I think he’d be happy to see you use it.
ch0251_00_onion/2501_0701_01_10:
P-people think I’m scary because I can see what
they can’t...
ch0251_00_onion/2501_0701_02_10: Y-you think it’s cool? Like it makes you shiver?
ch0251_00_onion/2501_0701_03_10:
Oh...so you really do think it’s cool that I can see
things? Th-that’s not usually what people say...
ch0251_00_onion/2501_0702_01_10:
It can be hard to relate to someone like me who
can see things that others can’t...
ch0251_00_onion/2501_0702_02_10: But thank you for trying to understand...
ch0251_00_onion/2511_0701_01_10:
Battles on Pasio can get so intense, I sometimes
drop and shatter my mask during battle...
ch0251_00_onion/2511_0701_03_10:
B-because I’ve got a spare...and a spare for that
spare, and so forth... All in all, I’ve got about a
hundred backup masks...
ch0251_00_onion/2511_0701_04_10: I-if you’d like, I can give one to you.
ch0251_00_onion/2511_0702_01_10:
Maybe if you wear one of my masks, you’ll come
to like Ghost-type Pokémon as much as I do...
ch0251_00_onion/2511_0702_02_10: And then...we could be even better friends...
ch0251_00_onion/3001_0701_01_10:
...Oh. Good morning...
Um...I reckon most ghost Pokémon are asleep
right now...
ch0251_00_onion/3005_0701_01_10:
*sigh*
Finally... Feels like I’ll have more energy now that
it’s d-dark out.
